author: aaron
msg: Sets the timer at 5 seconds. No signals are thrown. Measures the time
- If the timer comes back early with APR_TIMEUP, then it passes.
- If it comes back more than 100ms late, it fails.
(We may wish to fool with the timeout leeway, I think 100ms is pretty
generous, especially since the timeout is supposed to be a maximum.)
- If it comes back and there is no error, we try again (up to 5 times) since
it was probably just a spurious wakeup.
- If we get an error that is not APR_TIMEUP, it failed.
